name: Friends
description: Gain advantage on Charisma checks against one creature. After the spell ends, the creature knows you used magic to influence it.

name: Charm Person
description: Charm a humanoid. It regards you as a friendly acquaintance.

name: Command
description: Speak a one-word command to a creature. If it fails a Wisdom save, it obeys.

name: Calm Emotions
description: Suppress strong emotions in a group, ending charms or frightening effects.

name: Crown of Madness
description: Force a creature to attack a target of your choosing on its next turn.

name: Hold Person
description: Paralyze a humanoid. It can't move or take actions.
classes: Bard, Cleric, Druid, Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard

name: Hypnotic Pattern
description: Dazzling lights charm and incapacitate creatures in a 30-foot cube.

name: Compulsion
description: Force affected creatures to move in a direction you choose.

name: Confusion
description: Confuse creatures in a 10-foot radius; they act unpredictably.

name: Dominate Person
description: Take control of a humanoid’s actions.

name: Otto’s Irresistible Dance
description: A creature begins dancing uncontrollably, unable to take reactions, with disadvantage on attacks and Dex saves.

name: Power Word: Pain
description: Cause intense pain in a creature with 100 HP or less. It suffers disadvantage on attacks and ability checks.

name: Dominate Monster
description: Charm and control any creature (not just humanoids).

name: Power Word: Heal
description: Instantly restore a creature to full HP and end blindness, deafness, and paralysis.
